meanings.definition: The quality or state of being alterable.
meanings.sent1: Her alterabilities allowed her to adapt to new situations easily.
meanings.sent2: The alterabilities of the dress made it suitable for both casual and formal events.
meanings.sent3: The alterabilities of the chameleon made it the life of the party, changing colors to match the decorations.
meanings.sent4: His alterabilities in problem-solving were like a chameleon, always finding the perfect solution.
meanings.sent5: The alterabilities of the clay made it easy for the sculptor to shape it into any form.

meanings.definition: The ability to be changed or modified.
meanings.sent1: The alterabilities of the recipe allowed for customization based on personal preferences.
meanings.sent2: The alterabilities of technology have revolutionized the way we communicate.
meanings.sent3: The alterabilities of the weather forecast kept everyone guessing about what to wear.
meanings.sent4: Her alterabilities in adapting to new environments were like a superpower, making her unstoppable.
meanings.sent5: The alterabilities of the software made it a favorite among users for its flexibility.
